resources.string: Dose diary is a simple countdown toy. Suppose there is a thing X that you would like to do, but you are not allowed to do X more than once in 4 hours, or more than 4 times in 24 hours. Dose Diary counts down to the next time you are allowed to do X.
By using this app you agree that dose diary is just a toy and that you will not use it for anything medical, and especially not for controlling paracetamol intake.
